data.message: Hay Facebook, when are you going to fix your application for Android? Always not responding and messing up my work, but all the other applications and internet service works great. This is the 20th time I put in a compliant and gotten nothing. Fix your application. Thank you.

replies.message: Hey Zachary. If you're experiencing issues with your Facebook app for Android, there are a few things you can try. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2zHHpDa. -Elizabeth
